data.title: fuboTV Adds More FOX & NBC Affiliates - Now Has Over 300 Live Locals
data.meta_description: Today fuboTV added 3 new live locals including NBC and FOX. This puts fubotTV over 315 live local affilites. Here is everything fuboTV added today: NBC additions: WPTA – Ft. Wayne WAGT – Augusta, GA FOX addition: WSYT – Syracuse NY (replaces FoxNet in the market) Updated local coverage totals: FOX coverage in 93% of […]
data.text:
Today fuboTV added 3 new live locals including NBC and FOX. This puts fubotTV over 315 live local affilites.

Here is everything fuboTV added today:

NBC additions:

WPTA – Ft. Wayne

WAGT – Augusta, GA

FOX addition:

WSYT – Syracuse NY (replaces FoxNet in the market)

Updated local coverage totals:

FOX coverage in 93% of U.S. households, including 50 of the top 50 and 144 total DMAs (108 stations plus network feeds in 36 additional markets).

NBC coverage in 76% of U.S. households, including 42 of the top 50 and 87 total DMAs (88 stations).

CBS coverage in 70% of U.S. households, including 20 of the top 20, 35 of the top 50 and 75 total DMAs (75 stations).

TEL coverage in 86% of U.S. Hispanic households and 155 total DMAs (29 stations plus network feeds in 126 additional markets).

Here is every local fuboTV had before today:
